title: Add shareable warning-gate link and copyable URL

requirements.text: Add a new initial "Warning" screen that displays the text "Open this link at your own risk" and requires the user to click a "Continue" button before entering the existing app flow (404 -> invitation -> celebration).

quotes: warning open this link at your own risk please

acceptanceCriteria: When the app is opened via the dedicated share/warning URL, the Warning screen is the first thing shown.
The Warning screen contains the exact warning sentence: "Open this link at your own risk".
Clicking "Continue" transitions into the existing 404 screen and preserves all existing interactions/animations afterward.

requirements.text: Implement a shareable URL format that includes an explicit link segment/fragment (e.g., a hash fragment) to open the app directly in the Warning screen, and display this full share URL in the UI with a copy-to-clipboard action.

quotes: also you can add some link to the domain link

acceptanceCriteria: The app can derive a "share link" at runtime from the current window location (origin + path) plus the chosen fragment/segment for the Warning screen.
The UI shows the full share link as text and provides a "Copy" button that copies it to the clipboard.
Copy action provides clear success/failure feedback in the UI (English text).

requirements.text: Keep all user-facing text on the new Warning/share UI in English and align styling with the existing soft pastel aesthetic (card container, rounded edges, subtle shadows, smooth transitions).
acceptanceCriteria: All new UI strings are English.
Warning/share UI visually matches the existing design system (typography, rounded cards, shadows, transitions).

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn components are read-only).
Do not edit immutable hook files: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
nonGoals: Do not implement or depend on backend changes; backend/main.mo can remain unchanged.
Do not implement deployment-domain/slug validation logic in the app UI; deployment domain rules are handled by the deployment system.
